PalSphere.description: Captures Pals when thrown. This basic model is only effective on low level Pals.
PalSphere.name: Pal Sphere

PalSphere_Mega.description:
Captures Pals when thrown. Improved capabilities let it catch a wider range of Pals.
Requires Sphere Workbench to craft.
PalSphere_Mega.name: Mega Sphere

PalSphere_Giga.description:
Captures Pals when thrown. Can capture moderately powerful Pals.
Requires Sphere Workbench to craft.
PalSphere_Giga.name: Giga Sphere

PalSphere_Tera.description: Enhanced capabilities allow it to capture even more powerful Pals. Requires Sphere Assembly Line to craft.
PalSphere_Tera.name: Hyper Sphere

PalSphere_Master.description:
Captures Pals when thrown. Not many Pals can escape its highly efficient design.
Requires Sphere Assembly Line II to craft.
PalSphere_Master.name: Ultra Sphere

PalSphere_Legend.description:
Captures Pals when thrown. Very few Pals can escape its perfected design.
Requires Sphere Assembly Line II to craft.
PalSphere_Legend.name: Legendary Sphere

Bat.description: Can beat a small Pal to a pulp if need be.
Bat.name: Wooden Club

Bat2.description: Baseball bat for close-range combat. Might be tough to get a home run with a Pal.
Bat2.name: Bat

Torch.description: Place it at a base to light the surrounding area.
Torch.name: Mounted Torch

MeatCutterKnife.description:
Knife for butchering summoned Pals. When equipped, the Pet command becomes Butcher.
Butchered Pals will not return.
MeatCutterKnife.name: Meat Cleaver

Pickaxe_Tier_01.description: Mines stone and ore more efficiently. Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
Pickaxe_Tier_01.name: Metal Pickaxe

Pickaxe_Tier_02.description: Mines stone and ore even more efficiently. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
Pickaxe_Tier_02.name: Refined Metal Pickaxe

Axe_Tier_01.description: Harvests wood more efficiently. Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
Axe_Tier_01.name: Metal Axe

Axe_Tier_02.description: Harvests wood even more efficiently. Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
Axe_Tier_02.name: Refined Metal Axe

Spear.description: Spear useful for close-range combat. Its length allows the user to stand further away when attacking.
Spear.name: Stone Spear

Spear_2.description:
Spear useful for close-range combat. Made of metal and has increased attack power.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
Spear_2.name: Metal Spear

Spear_3.description:
Spear useful for close-range combat. Made of high-quality metal, it has increased attack power.
Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
Spear_3.name: Refined Metal Spear

Spear_ForestBoss.description: The spear cherished by Lily. Punishes those who neglect their Pals.
Spear_ForestBoss.name: Lily's Spear

ElecBaton.description:
Close range weapon that sends out an electric jolt upon contact. Pals are easier to capture when electrocuted.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
ElecBaton.name: Stun Baton

Sword.description:
Useful for close-range combat. Mightier than a pen, for sure.
Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.
Sword.name: Sword

WeakerBow.description: Primitive long range weapon. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.
WeakerBow.name: Old Bow

Bow_Fire.description: Burns Pals with fire arrows, making them easier to capture. Requires Fire Arrow.
Bow_Fire.name: Fire Bow

Bow_Poison.description:
Frightening bow that poisons its target. Poisoned Pals are easier to capture.
Requires Poison Arrow.
Bow_Poison.name: Poison Bow

Bow_Triple.description: Bow that fires three arrows simultaneously. Only consumes one arrow per shot.
Bow_Triple.name: Three Shot Bow

BowGun.description:
Fires an Arrow effortlessly. Takes time to load, but fires powerful shots.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
BowGun.name: Crossbow

BowGun_Fire.description:
Powerful long range weapon that deals Fire damage. Requires Fire Arrow.
Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.
BowGun_Fire.name: Fire Arrow Crossbow

BowGun_Poison.description:
Powerful long range weapon that poisons its target. Requires Poison Arrow to fire.
Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.
BowGun_Poison.name: Poison Arrow Crossbow

Musket.description:
Simple, old fashioned gun. Takes a long time to load. Needs Coarse Ammo to fire.
Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.
Musket.name: Musket

MakeshiftHandgun.description:
Single shot handgun created from spare parts. Requires Coarse Ammo to fire.
Crafted at Weapon Workbench.
MakeshiftHandgun.name: Makeshift Handgun

HandGun_Default.description:
Standard handgun. Easy to use. Requires Handgun Ammo to fire.
Crafted at Weapon Workbench.
HandGun_Default.name: Handgun

SingleShotRifle.description:
Takes time to load. Requires Rifle Ammo to fire.
Crafted at Production Assembly Line II.
SingleShotRifle.name: Single-shot Rifle

DoubleBarrelShotgun.description:
Wreaks havoc at close range. Can fire twice before reloading. Requires Shotgun Shells to fire.
Crafted at Production Assembly Line II.
DoubleBarrelShotgun.name: Double-barreled Shotgun

AssaultRifle_Default1.description:
Mows down enemies with overwhelming force. Requires Rifle Ammo to fire.
Crafted at Production Assembly Line II.
AssaultRifle_Default1.name: Assault Rifle

PumpActionShotgun.description:
Modern shotgun that can fire repeatedly. Requires Shotgun Shells to fire.
Crafted at Production Assembly Line II.
PumpActionShotgun.name: Pump-action Shotgun

Launcher_Default.description:
Launches powerful long range rockets. Requires Rocket Ammo to fire.
Requires Weapon Assembly Line II to craft.
Launcher_Default.name: Rocket Launcher

HomingSphereLauncher.description: Fires Pal Spheres that automatically home in on Pals. Requires Weapon Assembly Line II to craft.
HomingSphereLauncher.name: Homing Sphere Launcher

SphereLauncher.description:
Innovative launcher that fires many Spheres simultaneously. Can easily capture a herd of Pals.
Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
SphereLauncher.name: Scatter Sphere Launcher

SphereLauncher_Once.description: Can capture distant Pals. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
SphereLauncher_Once.name: Single-shot Sphere Launcher

DecalGun_1.description: Strange gun that paints a picture of Cattiva where it is fired. Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!
DecalGun_1.name: Decal Gun 1

DecalGun_2.description: Strange gun that paints a picture of Lamball where it is fired. Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!
DecalGun_2.name: Decal Gun 2

DecalGun_3.description: Strange gun that paints a picture of Melpaca where it is fired. Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!
DecalGun_3.name: Decal Gun 3

DecalGun_4.description: Strange gun that paints a picture of Anubis where it is fired. Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!
DecalGun_4.name: Decal Gun 4

DecalGun_5.description: Strange gun that paints a picture of Relaxaurus where it is fired. Have some fun and paint the walls or ceilings!
DecalGun_5.name: Decal Gun 5

GrapplingGun_1.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. It allows for easy movement between places with varying elevation.
GrapplingGun_1.name: Grappling Gun

GrapplingGun_2.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. Since it's upgraded, it now has greater range.
GrapplingGun_2.name: Mega Grappling Gun

GrapplingGun_3.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. Using data from prototype versions, its capabilities have been further increased.
GrapplingGun_3.name: Giga Grappling Gun

GrapplingGun_4.description: It fires a hook that latches on to distant targets, pulling the user's body towards the target. As a result of research, it has achieved overwhelming mobility.
GrapplingGun_4.name: Hyper Grappling Gun

FragGrenade.description: A Frag Grenade useful for mid-range combat. It detonates on impact when thrown, dealing damage to enemies.
FragGrenade.name: Frag Grenade

FragGrenade_Fire.description: Useful for mid-range combat. It detonates on impact when thrown, dealing damage and setting the surrounding environment on fire.
FragGrenade_Fire.name: Incendiary Grenade

FragGrenade_Elec.description: Useful for mid-range combat. It detonates on impact when thrown, dealing damage and electrifying the surrounding environment.
FragGrenade_Elec.name: Shock Grenade

FragGrenade_Ice.description: Useful for mid-range combat. It detonates on impact when thrown, dealing damage and freezing the surrounding environment.
FragGrenade_Ice.name: Ice Grenade

ClothArmor.description: Clothes made from Cloth. Protects against the cold of night.
ClothArmor.name: Cloth Outfit

ClothArmorHeat.description: A Cloth Outfit produced in hot regions. Can withstand some heat.
ClothArmorHeat.name: Tropical Outfit

ClothArmorCold.description: A Cloth Outfit produced in cold regions. Can withstand freezing cold temperatures.
ClothArmorCold.name: Tundra Outfit

FurArmor.description:
Armor made from Leather. Provides better warmth and protection than Cloth Outfit.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
FurArmor.name: Pelt Armor

FurArmorHeat.description:
Pelt Armor produced in hot climates. Helps to fend off the heat.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
FurArmorHeat.name: Heat Resistant Pelt Armor

FurArmorCold.description:
Pelt Armor produced in cold climates. Protects against freezing temperatures.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
FurArmorCold.name: Cold Resistant Pelt Armor

CopperArmor.description:
Armor made of metal. Somewhat heavy, but provides good defense.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
CopperArmor.name: Metal Armor

CopperArmorHeat.description:
Improved Metal Armor. Boasts high heat resistance.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
CopperArmorHeat.name: Heat Resistant Metal Armor

CopperArmorCold.description:
Improved Metal Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
CopperArmorCold.name: Cold Resistant Metal Armor

IronArmor.description:
Armor made from high quality metal. Quite heavy, but provides excellent defense.
Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
IronArmor.name: Refined Metal Armor

IronArmorHeat.description:
Improved Refined Metal Armor. Boasts high heat resistance.
Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
IronArmorHeat.name: Heat Resistant Refined Metal Armor

IronArmorCold.description:
Improved Refined Metal Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates.
Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
IronArmorCold.name: Cold Resistant Refined Metal Armor

StealArmor.description:
Armor fully utilizing the latest technology. Boasts overwhelming defense.
Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
StealArmor.name: Pal Metal Armor

StealArmorHeat.description:
Improved Pal Metal Armor. Boasts high heat resistance.
Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
StealArmorHeat.name: Heat Resistant Pal Metal Armor

StealArmorCold.description:
Improved Pal Metal Armor. Useful for surviving in cold climates.
Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
StealArmorCold.name: Cold Resistant Pal Metal Armor

FurHelmet.description:
Beautiful feathered headband. Somehow protects its wearer from lethal head injuries.
Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
FurHelmet.name: Feathered Hair Band

CopperHelmet.description:
Helm made of metal. Provides reliable skull protection.
Requires High Quality Workbench to craft.
CopperHelmet.name: Metal Helm

IronHelmet.description:
Helm made from high quality metal. Its sheen gives the wearer a greater sense of confidence.
Requires Production Assembly Line to craft.
IronHelmet.name: Refined Metal Helm

StealHelmet.description:
Helmet fully utilizing the latest technology. Ensures a good field of view and boasts the very best defense.
Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
StealHelmet.name: Pal Metal Helm

Arrow.description: Used with Old Bow. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.
Arrow.name: Arrow

Arrow_Fire.description: Used with Fire Bow. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.
Arrow_Fire.name: Fire Arrow

Arrow_Poison.description: Used with Poison Bow. Requires Primitive Workbench to craft.
Arrow_Poison.name: Poison Arrow

RoughBullet.description: Ammo for Musket, Makeshift Handgun and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.
RoughBullet.name: Coarse Ammo

HandgunBullet.description: Ammo used with Handgun and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Workbench to craft.
HandgunBullet.name: Handgun Ammo

RifleBullet.description: Ammo used with Single-shot Rifle and other similar weapons.
RifleBullet.name: Rifle Ammo

ShotgunBullet.description: Ammo used with Double-barreled Shotgun and other similar weapons.
ShotgunBullet.name: Shotgun Shells

AssaultRifleBullet.description: Ammo for Assault Rifle and other similar weapons. Requires Production Assembly Line II to craft.
AssaultRifleBullet.name: Assault Rifle Ammo

ExplosiveBullet.description: Ammo used with Rocket Launcher and other similar weapons. Requires Weapon Assembly Line II to craft.
ExplosiveBullet.name: Rocket Ammo

InkBullet.description: Ammo for a Decal Gun. Uses ink to paint a picture of a Pal.
InkBullet.name: Decal Ink

Shield_01.description: Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Repairs itself when not taking damage.
Shield_01.name: Common Shield

Shield_02.description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Improved prototype with higher defense.
Can be made at High Quality Workbench.
Shield_02.name: Mega Shield

Shield_03.description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Improved version with even higher defense.
Can be made at Production Assembly Line.
Shield_03.name: Giga Shield

Shield_04.description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology. Perfected after many trials.
Can be made at Production Assembly Line II.
Shield_04.name: Hyper Shield

Glider_Old.description: Glider for soaring through the air. Cheaply made and not so fast.
Glider_Old.name: Normal Parachute

Glider_Good.description:
Glider for soaring through the air. Although it's a mass produced model, it performs decently.
Can be made at High Quality Workbench.
Glider_Good.name: Mega Glider

Glider_Super.description: A glider for soaring through the air. With its capabilities improved, it can soar at high speeds.
Glider_Super.name: Giga Glider

Lantern.description:
A lantern that can be attached to the hip. It lights up automatically at night.
Just one is enough to find your way in the dark.
Lantern.name: Hip Lantern

AutoMealPouch_Tier1.description: Unlocks a food slot in your inventory. Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.
AutoMealPouch_Tier1.name: Small Feed Bag

AutoMealPouch_Tier2.description:
A decently sized pouch for holding food. Unlocks 2 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.
AutoMealPouch_Tier2.name: Average Feed Bag

AutoMealPouch_Tier3.description:
A large pouch for holding food. Unlocks 3 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.
AutoMealPouch_Tier3.name: Large Feed Bag

AutoMealPouch_Tier4.description:
An extremely large pouch for holding food. Unlocks 4 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.
AutoMealPouch_Tier4.name: Huge Feed Bag

AutoMealPouch_Tier5.description:
An extraordinarily large sack for storing food. Unlocks 5 food slots in your inventory.
Players and Pals automatically consume food when hungry.
AutoMealPouch_Tier5.name: Giant Feed Bag

Cloth.description: Cloth woven from Wool. Required to create armor.
Cloth.name: Cloth

Cloth2.description:
Woven from large amounts of Wool. Required to create high quality armor.
Can be made at High Quality Workbench.
Cloth2.name: High Quality Cloth

Gunpowder2.description:
Gunpowder used to fire ammunition. Required to make bullets.
Can be made at High Quality Workbench.
Gunpowder2.name: Gunpowder

Charcoal.description: Charcoal made from burning Wood. It can be combined with Sulfur to create Gunpowder.
Charcoal.name: Charcoal

MachineParts.description: Necessary for building various facilities. Can be made with a Primitive Workbench.
MachineParts.name: Nail

MachineParts2.description: Circuit Board required to create precision equipment. Can be made at High Quality Workbench.
MachineParts2.name: Circuit Board

Polymer.description: Made from refined oil. Required for producing various advanced items such as rifles.
Polymer.name: Polymer

Cement.description: Cement used for creating structures and more. Can be produced in a High Quality Workbench.
Cement.name: Cement

CarbonFiber.description: A lightweight yet sturdy material. Used to create armor among other equipment.
CarbonFiber.name: Carbon Fiber

RepairKit.description: Used for repairing destroyed structures. Use on destroyed structures.
RepairKit.name: Repair Kit

CopperIngot.description: A material required to create metal weapons and armor. Refined from Ore using a furnace.
CopperIngot.name: Ingot

IronIngot.description: A material required to create high quality metal weapons and armor. Refined from Ore and Coal using a furnace.
IronIngot.name: Refined Ingot

StealIngot.description: Material required to create weapons and armor using Pal Metal. Made stronger by creating an alloy from metal and Paldium.
StealIngot.name: Pal Metal Ingot

Herbs.description: Low Grade Medical Supplies good for colds and sprains. They don't heal HP when eaten, however.
Herbs.name: Low Grade Medical Supplies

Medicines.description: Strange Medical Supplies that are effective at treating Ulcer and Fracture. they do not heal Health.
Medicines.name: Medical Supplies

LuxuryMedicines.description: High Grade Medical Supplies that are effective at treating Weakened and Depressed. they do not heal Health.
LuxuryMedicines.name: High Grade Medical Supplies

MindControlDrug.description: Mind Control Meds that are extremely effective in controlling dissidents. they do not heal Health.
MindControlDrug.name: Mind Control Meds

Opium.description:
Juice that improves mood when consumed. Drinking it greatly increases work speed for a period of time,
but lowers SAN.
Opium.name: Suspicious Juice

Narcotic.description:
Juice that greatly improves mood when consumed. Drinking it significantly increases work speed for a period of time,
but significantly lowers SAN.
Narcotic.name: Strange Juice

StatusPointResetSan.description: A potion that allows the player to reset status points when consumed. It has no effect if consumed by Pal.
StatusPointResetSan.name: Memory Wiping Medicine

Fiber.description: Fiber collected from trees. A material used when creating bows, etc.
Fiber.name: Fiber

Pal_crystal_S.description: Crystallized energy from the World Tree. Capable of creating supernatural items and structures.
Pal_crystal_S.name: Paldium Fragment

BerrySeeds.description:
Seeds that produce Red Berries. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be obtained when picking Red Berries.
BerrySeeds.name: Berry Seeds

TomatoSeeds.description:
Seeds that produce Tomato. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.
TomatoSeeds.name: Tomato Seeds

LettuceSeeds.description:
Seeds that produce Lettuce. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.
LettuceSeeds.name: Lettuce Seeds

WheatSeeds.description:
Seeds that produce Wheat. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.
WheatSeeds.name: Wheat Seeds

Flour.description: Flour made from grinding Wheat. It can be used as an ingredient for Bread.
Flour.name: Flour

Baked_Berries.description: Cooking enhances their nutritional value, and surprisingly, they are quite filling.
Baked_Berries.name: Baked Berries

BakedMushroom.description: Cooking this mushroom enhances its nutritional value. Curiously, it's also quite filling.
BakedMushroom.name: Baked Mushroom

Pan.description: Bread made from baked Flour. A tasty staple food.
Pan.name: Bread

FriedEggs.description: An Egg now fried and even more delicious. Great for keeping hunger away.
FriedEggs.name: Fried Egg

HotMilk.description: Even more delicious when warmed up. Great for keeping hunger away.
HotMilk.name: Hot Milk

JamBun.description: A dish where jam is spread on the Bread. When consumed, it temporarily provides Defense +10%.
JamBun.name: Jam-filled Bun

Pancake.description: A dish baked by mixing Flour and Milk. It progressively decreases the rate at which one's sanity decreases when eaten.
Pancake.name: Pancake

Salad.description: A Salad made by mixing Lettuce and Tomato. When consumed, it temporarily grants Attack +15%, Defense -5%.
Salad.name: Salad

Omelet.description: A dish where Egg is fried and ketchup is added. Eating it results in a temporary Attack -5%, Defense+15%.
Omelet.name: Omelet

MarinatedMushrooms.description: A dish made by marinating Mushroom in a marinade. Eating it temporarily increases work speed.
MarinatedMushrooms.name: Marinated Mushrooms

MushroomSoup.description: Cream soup made of Mushroom. When eaten, it raises the work speed and improves the stomach fullness for a certain time.
MushroomSoup.name: Mushroom Soup

Pizza.description: A dish made by piling Red Berries, Tomato and cheese on Bread. Eating it improves Defense by +15% temporarily.
Pizza.name: Pizza

Carbonara.description: A dish mixing pasta with Egg and Milk. Eating it makes it harder for sanity to decrease and improves Defense by +10% for a certain amount of time.
Carbonara.name: Carbonara

Cake.description: A dish that is eaten during celebrations. It is essential when Pals lay eggs at the breeding farm.
Cake.name: Cake

SkillUnlock_Hedgehog.description: The Jolthog's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Hedgehog.name: Jolthog's Gloves

SkillUnlock_Hedgehog_Ice.description:
Rubber gloves for handling Jolthog Cryst. Activate its Partner Skill, and Jolthog Cryst
will throw ice grenades.
SkillUnlock_Hedgehog_Ice.name: Jolthog Cryst's Gloves

SkillUnlock_Kitsunebi.description: The Foxparks's Harness becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Kitsunebi.name: Foxparks's Harness

SkillUnlock_Alpaca.description: The Melpaca Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Alpaca.name: Melpaca Saddle

SkillUnlock_MopKing.description: The Sweepa Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_MopKing.name: Sweepa Saddle

SkillUnlock_Boar.description: The Rushoar Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Boar.name: Rushoar Saddle

SkillUnlock_FlyingManta.description: The Celaray's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_FlyingManta.name: Celaray's Gloves

SkillUnlock_Carbunclo.description: The Lifmunk's Submachine Gun becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Carbunclo.name: Lifmunk's Submachine Gun

SkillUnlock_Garm.description: The Direhowl's Saddled Harness becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Garm.name: Direhowl's Saddled Harness

SkillUnlock_Monkey.description: The Tanzee's Assault Rifle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Monkey.name: Tanzee's Assault Rifle

SkillUnlock_Serpent.description: The Surfent Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Serpent.name: Surfent Saddle

SkillUnlock_Serpent_Ground.description: Saddle for safely riding Surfent Terra.
SkillUnlock_Serpent_Ground.name: Aquadon Terra Saddle

SkillUnlock_Deer.description: The Eikthyrdeer Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Deer.name: Eikthyrdeer Saddle

SkillUnlock_Deer_Ground.description: The Hangyu's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Deer_Ground.name: Eikthyrdeer Terra Saddle

SkillUnlock_NaughtyCat.description: The Grintale Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_NaughtyCat.name: Grintale Saddle

SkillUnlock_Kirin.description: The Univolt Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Kirin.name: Univolt Saddle

SkillUnlock_NegativeOctopus.description: The Killamari's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_NegativeOctopus.name: Killamari's Gloves

SkillUnlock_ColorfulBird.description: The Tocotoco's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_ColorfulBird.name: Tocotoco's Gloves

SkillUnlock_HawkBird.description: The Nitewing Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_HawkBird.name: Nitewing Saddle

SkillUnlock_FlameBuffalo.description: The Arsox Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_FlameBuffalo.name: Arsox Saddle

SkillUnlock_FlowerRabbit.description: The Flopie's Necklace becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_FlowerRabbit.name: Flopie's Necklace

SkillUnlock_DrillGame.description: The Digtoise's Headband becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_DrillGame.name: Digtoise's Headband

SkillUnlock_Penguin.description: The Pengullet's Rocket Launcher becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Penguin.name: Pengullet's Rocket Launcher

SkillUnlock_FlowerDinosaur.description: The Dinossom Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_FlowerDinosaur.name: Dinossom Saddle

SkillUnlock_FlowerDinosaur_Electric.description: Saddle for safely riding Dinossom Lux.
SkillUnlock_FlowerDinosaur_Electric.name: Dinossom Lux Saddle

SkillUnlock_DreamDemon.description: The Daedream's Necklace becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_DreamDemon.name: Daedream's Necklace

SkillUnlock_SakuraSaurus.description: The Broncherry Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_SakuraSaurus.name: Broncherry Saddle

SkillUnlock_SakuraSaurus_Water.description: Saddle for safely riding Broncherry Aqua.
SkillUnlock_SakuraSaurus_Water.name: Water Broncherry Saddle

SkillUnlock_BirdDragon.description: The Vanwyrm Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_BirdDragon.name: Vanwyrm Saddle

SkillUnlock_BirdDragon_Ice.description: Saddle for safely riding Vanwyrm Cryst.
SkillUnlock_BirdDragon_Ice.name: Vanwyrm Cryst Saddle

SkillUnlock_WeaselDragon.description: The Chillet Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_WeaselDragon.name: Chillet Saddle

SkillUnlock_WindChimes.description: The Hangyu's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_WindChimes.name: Hangyu's Gloves

SkillUnlock_WindChimes_Ice.description: Gloves for gently holding on to Hangyu Cryst's arms. If Hangyu Cryst is in your team, it can be used as a glider.
SkillUnlock_WindChimes_Ice.name: Hangyu Cryst's Glove

SkillUnlock_KingAlpaca.description: The Kingpaca Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_KingAlpaca.name: Kingpaca Saddle

SkillUnlock_KingAlpaca_Ice.description: Saddle for safely riding Ice Kingpaca.
SkillUnlock_KingAlpaca_Ice.name: Ice Kingpaca Saddle

SkillUnlock_FairyDragon.description: The Elphidran Saddle becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_FairyDragon.name: Elphidran Saddle

SkillUnlock_FairyDragon_Water.description: Saddle for safely riding Elphidran Aqua.
SkillUnlock_FairyDragon_Water.name: Water Elphidran Saddle

SkillUnlock_RaijinDaughter.description: The Dazzi's Necklace becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_RaijinDaughter.name: Dazzi's Necklace

SkillUnlock_Eagle.description: The Galeclaw's Gloves becomes craftable at the Pal Gear Workbench.
SkillUnlock_Eagle.name: Galeclaw's Gloves

BakedMeat_ChickenPal.description: Chicken skewer slow-grilled over a charcoal fire. Light and refreshing on the tongue.
BakedMeat_ChickenPal.name: Grilled Chikipi

BakedMeat_SheepBall.description: Spiced and roasted mutton. Deeply complex with unique flavors.
BakedMeat_SheepBall.name: Lamball Kebab

BakedMeat_Kelpie.description: Fresh fish grilled over a charcoal fire. Plump and juicy.
BakedMeat_Kelpie.name: Grilled Kelpsea

BakedMeat_Eagle.description: Grilled meat full of vitality for flying high in the skies.
BakedMeat_Eagle.name: Grilled Galeclaw

BakedMeat_Boar.description:
Boar grilled over a hearty flame. Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside.
Perfect as an extravagant main dish for a big party.
BakedMeat_Boar.name: Roast Rushoar

BakedMeat_LazyCatfish.description:
Grilled fish slathered with a secret sauce. Soothes both mind and body.
Perfect for tired Pal Tamers.
BakedMeat_LazyCatfish.name: Broiled Dumud

BakedMeat_Deer.description:
Carefully roasted venison with delicate flavor notes accented by the aromas of the deep forest.
Elegant taste for an elegant lifestyle.
BakedMeat_Deer.name: Roast Eikthyrdeer

BakedMeat_IceDeer.description:
When taken from a flame, Reindrix meat rapidly drops in temperature. This allows it to retain freshness for long periods of time,
making it a perfect emergency ration.
BakedMeat_IceDeer.name: Roast Reindrix

BakedMeat_BerryGoat.description:
Mild roast filled with the natural aromas of herbs and berries embedded in the meat.
Gives a pleasant sense of warmth when eaten outdoors.
BakedMeat_BerryGoat.name: Herb Roasted Caprity

BakedMeat_CowPal.description: Thick, well-done steak. Strong flavors give those who eat it an energy boost.
BakedMeat_CowPal.name: Mozzarina Steak

BakedMeat_SakuraSaurus.description:
Grilled meat brimming with the flavor of the king of the wilds. Juices from the compressed meat flow from the bone,
making it surprisingly tender despite the initial toughness.
BakedMeat_SakuraSaurus.name: Broncherry Rib Roast

BakedMeat_GrassMammoth.description: Boasts a rich and dignified flavor. Memories of glaciers and deep forests come rushing back with every bite.
BakedMeat_GrassMammoth.name: Mammorest Steak

ChickenSaute.description:
Plump poultry sauted in butter. Accented with fresh lemons.
Eat to slightly increase work speed for a period of time.
ChickenSaute.name: Chikipi Saut

GrilledSheepHerbs.description:
Indulges in an abundance of fresh berries to create a tantalizing aroma that accentuates the unique flavor of mutton.
Eat to increase Defense by +10% for a period of time.
GrilledSheepHerbs.name: Herb Roasted Lamball

GenghisKhan.description:
Marinated mutton slow cooked over a grill. Eat to slightly increase work speed
and make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.
GenghisKhan.name: Grilled Lamball

Eaglestew.description: Slow-cooked dish that exudes a burst of rich, wild flavors. Eat to make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.
Eaglestew.name: Stewed Galeclaw

BaconEggs.description:
The smoky essence of bacon intertwines flawlessly with the gentle texture of eggs, creating a sublime harmony of flavors.
Eat to increase Attack by +10% for a period of time.
BaconEggs.name: Rushoar Bacon 'n' Eggs

StewedIceDeer.description:
Stewed vegetables and venison reared in a frigid environment. The meat's soft texture melts away to reveal a delicate sweetness.
Eat to stay full slightly longer for a period of time.
StewedIceDeer.name: Reindrix Stew

FriedChicken.description:
Magnificently juicy poultry. Eat to increase work speed
and make SAN decrease slower for a period of time.
FriedChicken.name: Fried Chikipi

HotDog_2.description:
Thick sausage wedged between warm buns. The crisply seared meat and spicy flavors are to die for.
Eat to increase Defense by +20% for a period of time.
HotDog_2.name: Rushoar Hot Dog

DeerLocoMoco.description:
Thick hamburger steak accented with a creamy fried egg. This sublime combination brings pure joy to the mouths of those who eat it.
Eat to increase Attack by +20% for a period of time.
DeerLocoMoco.name: Eikthyrdeer Loco Moco

DeerStew.description:
A tender, melt-in-your-mouth venison stew crafted with love. The intertwining flavors of vegetables and meat create a harmonious blend that brings out a comforting richness.
Eat to increase Defense by +20% for a period of time.
DeerStew.name: Eikthyrdeer Stew

Hamburger_2.description:
The rich flavor of beef melds with the sweetness of the buns in perfect harmony in this masterpiece. Eat to increase work speed
and make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.
Hamburger_2.name: Mozzarina Hamburger

Cheeseburger_2.description:
Now with cheese, this dish has reached the highest level of fine cuisine. Eat to increase Attack by +20%
and stay full longer for a period of time.
Cheeseburger_2.name: Mozzarina Cheeseburger

FriedKelpie.description:
Crunchy fried batter perfectly accentuates the Kelpsea's plumpness. Eat to increase Defense by +10%
and make SAN decrease slower for a period of time.
FriedKelpie.name: Fried Kelpsea

Chowder.description:
Dumud lavishly covered in a thick, creamy soup. Eat to increase work speed
and stay full slightly longer for a period of time.
Chowder.name: Dumud Chowder
